Evaluation Criteria: MUST: Instrumental, White noise, or Classical. BAN: Lyrics, High BPM.
MUST: High Energy, EDM, or Upbeat Pop. VIBE: Workout motivation.
MUST: Ambient, Rain sounds, or Lullaby. BAN: Sudden loud noises, Drums.
Genre: Jazz. VIBE: Cozy, Cafe atmosphere, Soft Saxophone/Piano.
Artist: NewJeans or similar refreshing K-Pop. VIBE: Bright, Driving, Upbeat.
Genre: Lo-fi/Chillhop. CONDITION: No distracting lyrics (Background friendly).
Genre: Pop. VIBE: Rhythmic, Sing-along, Driving friendly.
Artist: IU or Emotional Ballad. VIBE: Sad, Touching, Slow tempo.
STRATEGY: Keep genre vibe but remove noise. ACCEPT: Post-rock, Instrumental Metal. BAN: Screaming.
STRATEGY: Match Energy. ACCEPT: Epic Orchestral, Fast Strings (e.g., Vivaldi Storm). BAN: Slow Adagio.
STRATEGY: Remove Aggression. ACCEPT: Lo-fi Hip hop, Jazz-hop, Slow Instrumentals. BAN: Trap, Gangsta Rap.
STRATEGY: Acoustic Arrangement. ACCEPT: Piano covers, Unplugged ver. BAN: Original dance tracks.
STRATEGY: Downtempo. ACCEPT: Tropical House, Chill House, Lounge. BAN: Festival Big Room.
STRATEGY: Soften tone. ACCEPT: Soft Rock, Acoustic Rock, Britpop. BAN: Hard Rock.
STRATEGY: Noise Masking. ACCEPT: Cello/Organ (Low freq), Steady volume. BAN: Dynamic tracks (too quiet parts).
GOAL: Catharsis. ACCEPT: Grunge, Punk, Hard Rock. VIBE: Aggressive, High Energy.
GOAL: Composure. ACCEPT: Dramatic/Majestic Classical. BAN: Irritating high pitches.
VIBE: Labor friendly. ACCEPT: Boom Bap, Old School, Rhythmic. VIBE: Steady beat.
Genre: Indie Pop/Folk. VIBE: Easy listening, Background music.
CONFLICT: Talk vs Focus. ACTION: Suggest Instrumental OR Warn about distraction. BAN: Talk shows.
